cause.description:
Dyscalculia is a math-related learning disability. Dyscalculia has been recognized by groups like the World Health Organization for years, but isn't well known to the general public.
For more information on dyscalculia, visit the following websites:
www.dyscalculia.org www.dyscalculiaforum.com
More information is available by typing "dyscalculia" into Google!
1. To spread knowledge about dyscalculia
cause.name: Dyscalculia
